verses.verse: Behold, <S%H3117><s%> a day of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> comes, <S%H935><s%> when your spoil <S%H7998><s%> will be divided <S%H2505><s%> in your midst. <S%H7130><s%>

For I will gather <S%H622><s%> all nations <S%H1471><s%> against Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to battle; <S%H4421><s%> and the city <S%H5892><s%> will be taken, <S%H3920><s%> the houses <S%H1004><s%> rifled, <S%H8155><s%> and the women <S%H802><s%> ravished. <S%H7901><s%> Half <S%H2677><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> will go out <S%H3318><s%> into captivity, <S%H1473><s%> and the rest <S%H3499><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> will not be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from the city. <S%H5892><s%>

Then Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will go out <S%H3318><s%> and fight <S%H3898><s%> against those nations, <S%H1471><s%> as when <S%H3117><s%> he fought <S%H3898><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of battle. <S%H7128><s%>

His feet <S%H7272><s%> will stand <S%H5975><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%> on the Mount <S%H2022><s%> of Olives, <S%H2132><s%> which is before <S%H6440><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> on the east; <S%H6924><s%> and the Mount <S%H2022><s%> of Olives <S%H2132><s%> will be split <S%H1234><s%> in two, <S%H2677><s%> from east <S%H4217><s%> to west, <S%H3220><s%> making a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> valley. <S%H1516><s%> Half <S%H2677><s%> of the mountain <S%H2022><s%> will move <S%H4185><s%> toward the north, <S%H6828><s%> and half <S%H2677><s%> of it toward the south. <S%H5045><s%>

You shall flee <S%H5127><s%> by the valley <S%H1516><s%> of my mountains; <S%H2022><s%> for the valley <S%H1516><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%> shall reach <S%H5060><s%> to Azel; <S%H682><s%> yes, <S%H5127><s%> you shall flee, just like you fled <S%H5127><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> the earthquake <S%H7494><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Uzziah <S%H5818><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%> will come, <S%H935><s%> and all the holy ones with you. <S%H6918><s%>
It will happen in that day, <S%H3117><s%> that there will not be light, <S%H216><s%> cold, <S%H3368><s%> or frost. <S%H7087><s%>

It will be a unique <S%H259><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> which is known <S%H3045><s%> to Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> not day, <S%H3117><s%> and not night; <S%H3915><s%> but it will come to pass, <S%H6153><s%> that at evening time <S%H6256><s%> there will be light. <S%H216><s%>

It will happen in that day, <S%H3117><s%> that living <S%H2416><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> will go out <S%H3318><s%> from Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> half <S%H2677><s%> of them toward the eastern <S%H6931><s%> sea, <S%H3220><s%> and half <S%H2677><s%> of them toward the western <S%H314><s%> sea; <S%H3220><s%> in summer <S%H7019><s%> and in winter will it be. <S%H2779><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will be King <S%H4428><s%> over all the earth. <S%H776><s%> In that day <S%H3117><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will be one, <S%H259><s%> and his name <S%H8034><s%> one. <S%H259><s%>

All the land <S%H776><s%> will be made like the Arabah, <S%H6160><s%> from Geba <S%H1387><s%> to Rimmon <S%H7417><s%> south <S%H5045><s%> of Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> and she will be lifted up, <S%H7213><s%> and will dwell <S%H3427><s%> in her place, <S%H4725><s%> from Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>'s gate <S%H8179><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> of the first <S%H7223><s%> gate, <S%H8179><s%> to the corner <S%H6434><s%> gate, <S%H8179><s%> and from the tower <S%H4026><s%> of Hananel <S%H2606><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%>'s winepresses. <S%H3342><s%>
Men will dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein, <S%H2764><s%> and there will be no more curse; but Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> will dwell <S%H3427><s%> safely. <S%H983><s%>

This will be the plague <S%H4046><s%> with which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will strike <S%H5062><s%> all the peoples <S%H5971><s%> who have warred <S%H6633><s%> against Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%> their flesh <S%H1320><s%> will consume away <S%H4743><s%> while they stand <S%H5975><s%> on their feet, <S%H7272><s%> and their eyes <S%H5869><s%> will consume away <S%H4743><s%> in their sockets, <S%H2356><s%> and their tongue <S%H3956><s%> will consume away <S%H4743><s%> in their mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

It will happen in that day, <S%H3117><s%> that a great <S%H7227><s%> panic <S%H4103><s%> from Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will be among them; <S%H2388><s%> and they will lay hold everyone <S%H376><s%> on the hand <S%H3027><s%> of his neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> and his hand <S%H3027><s%> will rise up <S%H5927><s%> against the hand <S%H3027><s%> of his neighbor. <S%H7453><s%>

Judah <S%H3063><s%> also will fight <S%H3898><s%> at Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> and the wealth <S%H2428><s%> of all the surrounding <S%H5439><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> will be gathered together: <S%H622><s%> gold, <S%H2091><s%> and silver, <S%H3701><s%> and clothing, <S%H899><s%> in great <S%H3966><s%> abundance. <S%H7230><s%>

So will be the plague <S%H4046><s%> of the horse, <S%H5483><s%> of the mule, <S%H6505><s%> of the camel, <S%H1581><s%> and of the donkey, <S%H2543><s%> and of all the animals <S%H929><s%> that will be in those <S%H1992><s%> camps, <S%H4264><s%> as that plague. <S%H4046><s%>

It will happen that everyone who is left <S%H3498><s%> of all the nations <S%H1471><s%> that came <S%H935><s%> against Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> will go up <S%H5927><s%> from <S%H1767><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> to year <S%H8141><s%> to worship <S%H7812><s%> the King, <S%H4428><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> and to keep <S%H2287><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of tents. <S%H5521><s%>

It will be, <S%H4940><s%> that whoever of all the families of the earth <S%H776><s%> doesn't <S%H5927><s%> go up to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to worship <S%H7812><s%> the King, <S%H4428><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> on them there will be no rain. <S%H1653><s%>

If the family <S%H4940><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> doesn't <S%H5927><s%> go up, and doesn't <S%H935><s%> come, neither will it rain on them. <S%H4046><s%> This will be the plague with which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will strike <S%H5062><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> that don't <S%H5927><s%> go up to keep <S%H2287><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of tents. <S%H5521><s%>

This will be the punishment <S%H2403><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and the punishment <S%H2403><s%> of all the nations <S%H1471><s%> that don't <S%H5927><s%> go up to keep <S%H2287><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of tents. <S%H5521><s%>

In that day <S%H3117><s%> there will be on the bells <S%H4698><s%> of the horses, <S%H5483><s%> "HOLY <S%H6944><s%> TO YAHWEH; <S%H3068><s%>" and the pots <S%H5518><s%> in Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> will be like the bowls <S%H4219><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

Yes, <S%H5518><s%> every pot in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and in Judah <S%H3063><s%> will be holy <S%H6944><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies; <S%H6635><s%> and all those who sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> will come <S%H935><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> of them, <S%H1310><s%> and cook in them. <S%H3117><s%> In that day there will no longer be a Canaanite <S%H3669><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%>
